channel.title: Minecraft Xbox 360 Edition: Community World?
channel.description:
For the official thread click the link http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php/topic,560516.0.html
So as most of you know Minecraft Xbox edition is out and lots of people play it. I have thought of an Idea where we could run our own little Community World for the xbox. I know it will be hard as we'd have no administrators or anything but its worth a shot. We could do like currencies being diamond, iron ingots, and gold ingots. Get your own plot of land and add on later to it. I have a lot of ideas if people would like to give it a go. I am willing to leave my xbox on 24/7 if it gets that popular. Right now I am leveling out an area for a starting area.
So due to the problem of possible greifers, I am closing this community world to trusted members who are accepted through this application. Fill this application down below. Chassy and I will be communicating with each other about each applicant. Our decision will be PM'd to you by me or Chassy. If you're accepted, more information will be disclosed to you.
[code=Minecraft Xbox 360 Edition: Mopar Community World Member Application] Name: Age: Past Contributions to the Mopar Community: How long have you been registered: How can we trust you?: Do you agree to follow all rules(soon to be written) and if you are caught breaking any, you will be completely removed from my friends list and not be allowed to join the server:
Thank you for Applying. We will get back to you via PM ASAP.[/code]
The following rules must be followed while playing on the Mopar Community World 1. No Duping allowed. Any form of duping will not be tolerated and you will be automatically kicked from the world and removed from my friends list. 2. If friends want to join, they will have to sign into Moparscape and fill out the application that everyone else will have to. No one will be able to join without being on my friends list. Friends of Friends will be turned off but the world will be open to all who have been accepted. 3. If your application was denied you have 30 days before applying again. If you apply before the 30 days are up, you will automatically be denied and you won’t be able to apply for another 30 days. 4. By no means will you be allowed to rage/ spam this official thread or spam PM me or Chassy if you were denied. If you were denied, we have our reasons so please respect our choices. 5. No TNT, Setting fire to peoples’ houses or any other form of griefing will be allowed. If you’re caught then you will automatically be kicked from the world and removed from my friends lists 6. Depending on the severity of rules broken, all infractions vary. If they are severe enough, you will be added to a list of people who will never again have a chance to join the world again.
[b]If anyone who breaks these rules and who was kicked feels the reason to spam me over XBL with messages, I will block all communications with you and you will have no chance ever of coming back.[/b]
Again, Only trusted members of the Mopar Community will be allowed to join this world, so if you’re accepted, enjoy the privilege and don’t abuse it!

item.title: Minecraft Xbox 360 Edition: Community World?
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:17, topic:455081”]Sorry to keep the applicants on hold so long, but there was a problem with the first one. I will be recreating another world and I will go through the applicants again. There is no need to apply again.

I’ll probably write up a new thread or something, but for now this project is on hold until I get some free time.[/quote]I’m here to help. Let me know when you’re on and I will try to get on and help. I can pm you a list of applicants I accepted.

Read full topic

item.title: Minecraft Xbox 360 Edition: Community World?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Sorry to keep the applicants on hold so long, but there was a problem with the first one. I will be recreating another world and I will go through the applicants again. There is no need to apply again.

I’ll probably write up a new thread or something, but for now this project is on hold until I get some free time.

Read full topic

item.title: Minecraft Xbox 360 Edition: Community World?
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:14, topic:455081”]Name: Frank
Age: 16
Past Contributions to the Mopar Community: Made Apophysis and modeling tutorials, released many models, etc.
How long have you been registered: Since June 2009
How can we trust you?: Well you can trust me in the same manner you’d trust anyone else - by trusting them.
Yes, I agree to the rules.

GT: Franks115

Don’t expect me on all too much though, I rarely play Minecraft anymore, let alone XBox, but regardless, I’d contribute to the world however I could (mob/slime generators, structures such as massive castles and mine markers).[/quote]
Omg same name as me you sexy man! Amd don’t you live in jersey? I do, Ed avers long lost brother

Read full topic

item.title: Minecraft Xbox 360 Edition: Community World?
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Name: Frank
Age: 16
Past Contributions to the Mopar Community: Made Apophysis and modeling tutorials, released many models, etc.
How long have you been registered: Since June 2009
How can we trust you?: Well you can trust me in the same manner you’d trust anyone else - by trusting them.
Yes, I agree to the rules.

GT: Franks115

Don’t expect me on all too much though, I rarely play Minecraft anymore, let alone XBox, but regardless, I’d contribute to the world however I could (mob/slime generators, structures such as massive castles and mine markers).

Read full topic

item.title: Minecraft Xbox 360 Edition: Community World?
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

Name:Frank
Age:15
Past Contributions to the Mopar Community: a decent amount I guess
How long have you been registered: a year almost
How can we trust you?: because I love mine craft and and mopar. Those 2 things together are awesome
Do you agree to follow all rules(soon to be written) and if you are caught breaking any, you will be completely removed from my friends list and not be allowed to join the server:
Agreed sir!

Thank you for Applying. We will get back to you via PM ASAP.

Read full topic

item.description:

I can throw in some feedback in any applicants, yes. It shouldn’t be too hard to distinguish most of the applicants.

item.title: Minecraft Xbox 360 Edition: Community World?
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

I won’t have Friends of Friends on, just my friends can join. And yea that sadly is the problem. Chassy you want to run a application system with me. You can help me review people since you’ve been here longer and you know more people? and no tyb no one yet. I had a weird title on here so it didnt get much attention until i changed the title.

Read full topic

item.title: Minecraft Xbox 360 Edition: Community World?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

It should probably be limited to trusted people of the community because there is no way to reverse anything or detect griefers. Most importantly, there is no way to get rid of a griefer if one is to join.

Read full topic

item.title: Minecraft Xbox 360 Edition: Community World?
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

For the official thread click the link http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php/topic,560516.0.html

So as most of you know Minecraft Xbox edition is out and lots of people play it. I have thought of an Idea where we could run our own little Community World for the xbox. I know it will be hard as we’d have no administrators or anything but its worth a shot. We could do like currencies being diamond, iron ingots, and gold ingots. Get your own plot of land and add on later to it. I have a lot of ideas if people would like to give it a go. I am willing to leave my xbox on 24/7 if it gets that popular. Right now I am leveling out an area for a starting area.

So due to the problem of possible greifers, I am closing this community world to trusted members who are accepted through this application. Fill this application down below. Chassy and I will be communicating with each other about each applicant. Our decision will be PM’d to you by me or Chassy. If you’re accepted, more information will be disclosed to you.

[code=Minecraft Xbox 360 Edition: Mopar Community World Member Application]
Name:
Age:
Past Contributions to the Mopar Community:
How long have you been registered:
How can we trust you?:
Do you agree to follow all rules(soon to be written) and if you are caught breaking any, you will be completely removed from my friends list and not be allowed to join the server:

Thank you for Applying. We will get back to you via PM ASAP.[/code]

The following rules must be followed while playing on the Mopar Community World

  1. No Duping allowed. Any form of duping will not be tolerated and you will be automatically kicked from the world and removed from my friends list.
  2. If friends want to join, they will have to sign into Moparscape and fill out the application that everyone else will have to. No one will be able to join without being on my friends list. Friends of Friends will be turned off but the world will be open to all who have been accepted.
  3. If your application was denied you have 30 days before applying again. If you apply before the 30 days are up, you will automatically be denied and you won’t be able to apply for another 30 days.
  4. By no means will you be allowed to rage/ spam this official thread or spam PM me or Chassy if you were denied. If you were denied, we have our reasons so please respect our choices.
  5. No TNT, Setting fire to peoples’ houses or any other form of griefing will be allowed. If you’re caught then you will automatically be kicked from the world and removed from my friends lists
  6. Depending on the severity of rules broken, all infractions vary. If they are severe enough, you will be added to a list of people who will never again have a chance to join the world again.

If anyone who breaks these rules and who was kicked feels the reason to spam me over XBL with messages, I will block all communications with you and you will have no chance ever of coming back.

Again, Only trusted members of the Mopar Community will be allowed to join this world, so if you’re accepted, enjoy the privilege and don’t abuse it!

Read full topic
